official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that retired administrative law judges may be reappointed under regulations prescribed by the Director of the Office of Personnel Management, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Allows retired administrative law judges to be reappointed as administrative law judges under regulations prescribed by the Office of Personnel Management.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that retired administrative law judges may be reappointed under regulations prescribed by the Director of the Office of Personnel Management, and for other purposes.
